#################################################

Release Name:
Amazing.Adventures.2.Around.the.World.(PopCap.Games)-WWW

Release Type: PC Game
Game: Amazing Adventures 2 Around the World
Language: English
 
#################################################

System Requirements:
Processor: Pentium - 350MHz or better
RAM: 128MB
Video card RAM: 32MB
DirectX Version: 7.0 or above
Operating System: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
	
#################################################

How to install:
1. Run Amazing Adventures 2 Around the World_setup.exe
2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

Start your Amazing Adventures as pieces of an ancient stone tablet start turning up around the globe. A museum needs your help to find the most breathtaking gem ever known...the "World Diamond". Travel to 25 striking locations around the world and find more than 2100 hidden objects in 3 different game modes. Take on 8 different types of mini-game puzzles including the popular "spot-the-differences." Good luck on your Amazing Adventures Around the World!
